sentences.en: Employees must familiarize themselves with the health and safety manual.
sentences.cn: 雇员必须熟悉健康和安全手册。

sentences.en: Familiarize yourself with the new equipment before attempt to use it.
sentences.cn: 使用新设备之前要先熟悉一下.

sentences.en: Familiarize yourself with the new equipment before you attempt to use it.
sentences.cn: 在想使用新设备之前,你要先熟悉它.

sentences.en: Familiarize yourself with the table of contents , summaries, bolded text and sidebars.
sentences.cn: 熟悉其中的表格 、 摘要 、 黑体字及边栏提示.

sentences.en: He ran a hand over his face, trying to familiarize himself with the new shape.
sentences.cn: 他伸手摸一下脸, 想熟悉自己的新面貌.

sentences.en: He tried to familiarize himself with the use of the new fool.
sentences.cn: 他努力熟悉新工具的使用.

sentences.en: I wonder whether you will familiarize us with your technical know - how.
sentences.cn: 我想知道你们是否愿意让我们熟悉技术诀窍.

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon all users of this equipment to familiarize themselves with the safety procedure.
sentences.cn: 凡使用这种设备的人都应熟悉安全程序.

sentences.en: Only reading can familiarize literature tous.
sentences.cn: 只有阅读才能使我们亲近文学.

sentences.en: She was scarcely able to familiarize herself with this strange reality.
sentences.cn: 要使她自己对这种奇怪的现实不觉奇怪,几乎有些作不到.

sentences.en: The goal of the experiment was to familiarize the people with the new laws.
sentences.cn: 试行的目的就是要让人们熟悉新法规。

sentences.en: To familiarize ourselves with your products, we need some technical details.
sentences.cn: 为使我们熟悉贵公司的产品, 我们需要一些技术方面的细节.

sentences.en: We should familiarize students with the use of periodicals.
sentences.cn: 我们应当使学生们精通如何使用期刊杂志.

sentences.en: You must familiarize yourself with the rules before playing the game.
sentences.cn: 玩这游戏以前你必须熟悉其规则.

sentences.en: You should familiarize yourself with its rules before you play the game.
sentences.cn: 你在玩这游戏前得熟悉它的规则.

trans.tran_en: to learn about something so that you understand it, or to teach someone else about something so that they understand it
to learn about something so that you understand it, or to teach someone else about something so that they understand it
